description: The fringed poppy mallow, Callirhoe digitata, is a beautiful and amazing species of wildflower. It stands out from other poppies and mallows with its deep pink petals which are completely fringed like beautiful lace. It not only adds beauty to the garden, but also benefits the environment with its deep taproots that help conserve soil moisture, making it especially suited for dry soils. Its perennial nature also makes it perfect for attracting pollinators throughout the year with its cheery deep pink flowers. It's a truly stunning and remarkable species!
